lead_paragraph: Ko seized the advantage when Ariya Jutanugarn faltered late and won the ANA Inspiration on Sunday, capturing her second straight L.P.G.A. major victory.

headline.print_headline: Ko’s Victory Is Her 2nd in a Row in Majors
headline.main: Lydia Ko’s Victory Is Her 2nd in a Row In Majors

snippet: Ko seized the advantage when Ariya Jutanugarn faltered late and won the ANA Inspiration on Sunday, capturing her second straight L.P.G.A. major victory.
abstract: Lydia Ko wins ANA Inspiration golf tournament in Rancho Mirage, Calif.
